@JohnCornyn @WSJ I'm amazed at your inability to understand simple concepts, Senator. Testing is the first step in a test-trace- isolate program. Please listen to Scott Gotlieb, former Trump admin member,  in this radio program. Scroll down to the blue Listen button.
